definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
same as 寧缺毋濫|宁缺毋滥[ning4 que1 wu2 lan4]
(idiom) don't say you haven't been forewarned (threat used by the PRC in international diplomacy)
pinyin: wu4 wei4 yan2 zhi1 bu4 yu4

definition: Never forget national humiliation, refers to Mukden railway incident of 18th September 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变 and subsequent Japanese annexation of Manchuria
to put something aside for the time being (idiom)
(of one's political views) to prefer left rather than right (idiom during the Cultural Revolution)
What you don't want done to you, don't do to others. (idiom, from the Confucian analects)/Do as you would be done by./Do not do to others what you would not have them do to you.
pinyin: ji3 suo3 bu4 yu4 , wu4 shi1 yu2 ren2

definition: variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]
don't forget your friends when you become rich
pinyin: gou3 fu4 gui4 , wu4 xiang1 wang4

sentences.english: Like all drugs，Miacalcic should be kept out of reach of children.
sentences.chinese: 與其他藥物一樣，密鈣息應妥善保存，勿讓兒童接觸。

sentences.english: Don't block the outlet of the bonnet.
sentences.chinese: 勿擋住室外機的出風口。
勿那任何木製的的五分錢。

sentences.english: Keep this product away from rain and wetness.
sentences.chinese: 勿讓本產品淋雨或受潮。

sentences.english: Should take after the bus , not to vie with each other , not bicheng bit crowded.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐公共汽車應先下後上，勿爭先恐後，勿擠逼搶位。

sentences.english: Should take after the bus , not to vie with each other , not bicheng bit crowded.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐公共汽車應先下後上，勿爭先恐後，勿擠逼搶位。

sentences.english: The enclosure will reach you twice a year, don't refuse it.
sentences.chinese: 信中附款，你每年將收到兩次，望勿拒絕。

sentences.english: Ep560 - Old Madam Hong tries to persuade Zhizhong stop his evil deeds, but Zhizhong ignores her.
sentences.chinese: 洪老太苦口婆心勸志忠勿再做壞事，但志忠不加理會。

sentences.english: Do not use under dry condition.
Do not spray over food or tableware.
We will seek the Chinese side's self-restraint from taking such dangerous action.
sentences.chinese: 我們將尋求中方剋制，勿採取如此危險的行動。

sentences.english: Keep off fame and wealth; crave not external attractions. Always see life as a candle flickering in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 勿涉足名利，勿貪戀外境，時刻視生命如風中之燭。

sentences.english: Keep off fame and wealth; crave not external attractions. Always see life as a candle flickering in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 勿涉足名利，勿貪戀外境，時刻視生命如風中之燭。

sentences.english: The first case occurred in a five-year-old male from East Bekasi, West Java Province.
sentences.chinese: 第一例發生於西爪哇省東勿加泗一名5歲男童。

sentences.english: Don't button up brooch on the silk clothing, otherwise leave pinprick easily.
sentences.chinese: 勿在絲綢服裝上扣別針，否則易留下針眼。

sentences.english: Check gyro and do not reset remainder of approach.
sentences.chinese: 檢查陀螺儀，進近時勿再撥置。

definition: you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind
not in such a way as to/not likely to
one's old self/one's original self/what one has always been
